languages.text: "Он передал мне сообщение — неожиданно душевное". {n}Соломон прикрывает глаза и почтительно цитирует ровным тоном:{/n} "Соломон Антар, ты вновь возведен в ранг проктора — впредь пусть и тени недостойности не ложится на твой мундир".

"He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"
languages.original_text: "Он передал мне сообщение — неожиданно душевное". {n}Соломон прикрывает глаза и почтительно цитирует ровным тоном:{/n} "Соломон Антар, ты вновь возведен в ранг проктора — впредь пусть и тени недостойности не ложится на твой мундир".

traits.locale_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

"He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

"He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

languages.text: 「連絡はありました。驚くほど真心のこもった文面でした」{n}ソロモーンは静かに目を閉じ、落ち着いた敬意ある口調で言葉を引用した。{/n}「ソロモーン・アンサールよ、ここに代理人の職位への復帰を命ずる。その制服に、二度と不名誉の影すら落とすことのないように」
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

traits.locale_text: 「連絡はありました。驚くほど真心のこもった文面でした」{n}ソロモーンは静かに目を閉じ、落ち着いた敬意ある口調で言葉を引用した。{/n}「ソロモーン・アンサールよ、ここに代理人の職位への復帰を命ずる。その制服に、二度と不名誉の影すら落とすことのないように」

languages.text: "Er hat eine Nachricht gesendet – und die Formulierung war ungewöhnlich emotional." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen und zitiert in klarem, respektvollem Ton:{/n} "Solomorne Antahr, Ihr werdet hiermit in Euren Rang als Proktor wiedereingesetzt. Lasst niemals wieder zu, dass auch nur ein Schatten der Ehrlosigkeit Eure Uniform beschmutzt."
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

traits.locale_text: "Er hat eine Nachricht gesendet – und die Formulierung war ungewöhnlich emotional." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen und zitiert in klarem, respektvollem Ton:{/n} "Solomorne Antahr, Ihr werdet hiermit in Euren Rang als Proktor wiedereingesetzt. Lasst niemals wieder zu, dass auch nur ein Schatten der Ehrlosigkeit Eure Uniform beschmutzt."

languages.text: « Il m'a envoyé un message particulièrement chaleureux. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et vous récite le contenu de la lettre d'un ton égal :{/n} « Solomorne Anthar, par cette lettre, je vous informe de votre réintégration au rang de proctor. Ne laissez plus jamais l'ombre du déshonneur ternir votre uniforme. »
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

traits.locale_text: « Il m'a envoyé un message particulièrement chaleureux. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et vous récite le contenu de la lettre d'un ton égal :{/n} « Solomorne Anthar, par cette lettre, je vous informe de votre réintégration au rang de proctor. Ne laissez plus jamais l'ombre du déshonneur ternir votre uniforme. »

languages.text: «Me ha enviado un mensaje, y bastante más cordial de lo habitual». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y cita el mensaje con tono neutral y respetuoso:{/n} «Solomorne Anthar, por la presente se le restituye su rango de procurador. No consienta que el más mínimo atisbo de deshonra vuelva a mancillar su uniforme».
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

traits.locale_text: «Me ha enviado un mensaje, y bastante más cordial de lo habitual». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y cita el mensaje con tono neutral y respetuoso:{/n} «Solomorne Anthar, por la presente se le restituye su rango de procurador. No consienta que el más mínimo atisbo de deshonra vuelva a mancillar su uniforme».

languages.text: “他确实向我发了信息，而且措辞相当真诚。”{n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛，以平静、尊重的语气开了口。{/n}“索罗蒙·安萨，在此恢复监察官原职，再也不要耻辱的阴影玷污你的制服了。”
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

traits.locale_text: “他确实向我发了信息，而且措辞相当真诚。”{n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛，以平静、尊重的语气开了口。{/n}“索罗蒙·安萨，在此恢复监察官原职，再也不要耻辱的阴影玷污你的制服了。”

languages.text: "Mesaj göndermiş. Üslubu da alışılmadık derecede samimiydi." {n}Gözlerini kapatan Solomorne; düzgün, saygılı bir tavırla alıntı yapıyor.{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, bu belgeyle Üsteğmen rütbenin iadesi yapılmıştır. Bir daha asla üniformanın bir onursuzluk gölgesiyle lekelenmesine müsaade gösterme.'"
languages.original_text: "He did send a message — and the phrasing was unusually heartfelt." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and quotes in an even, respectful tone:{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, you are hereby restored to your rank of Proctor. Never allow even a shadow of dishonour to fall on your uniform again.'"

Üslubu da alışılmadık derecede samimiydi." {n}Solomorne gözlerini kapatıyor ve düzgün, saygılı bir tavırla alıntı yapıyor{/n} "'Solomorne Anthar, bu belgeyle Üsteğmen rütbenin iadesi yapılmıştır. Bir daha asla üniformanın bir onursuzluk gölgesiyle lekelenmesine müsaade gösterme.'"
